nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify 
that a new owner has been assigned.
nodes.name: OwnershipTransferred

nodes.documentation:
Any function with this modifier can only be invoked by the 
owner of this contract and all other contracts whcih inherit 
this contract.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
Returns the ETH address of the owner of any contract which 
inherits this contract.

     * @return The address of the owner.
nodes.name: getOwner

nodes.documentation: Initializes the owner variable with an address (can only be invoked once).
nodes.name: assignOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The new owner's address cannot be 0x00...00"

arguments.value: The new owner's address cannot be 0x00...00

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The new owner's address cannot be 0x00...00"

nodes.documentation:
Allows the current owner of the contract and all contracts 
which inherit this contract to transfer ownership to another 
ETH address. This function can only be invoked by the owner 
of the contract. 

     * @param _newOwner - The address of the new owner.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:

that a new owner has been assigned.
nodes.name: OwnershipTransferred

nodes.documentation:
Any function with this modifier can only be invoked by the 
owner of this contract and all other contracts whcih inherit 
this contract.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:

     * @return The address of the owner.
nodes.name: getOwner

nodes.documentation: Initializes the owner variable with an address (can only be invoked once).
nodes.name: assignOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The new owner's address cannot be 0x00...00"

nodes.documentation:
Allows the current owner of the contract and all contracts 
which inherit this contract to transfer ownership to another 
ETH address. This function can only be invoked by the owner 
of the contract. 

     * @param _newOwner - The address of the new owner.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

params._newOwner: - The address of the new owner.

assignOwner(address).notice: Initializes the owner variable with an address (can only be invoked once).

getOwner().notice: Returns the ETH address of the owner of any contract which  inherits this contract.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows the current owner of the contract and all contracts  which inherit this contract to transfer ownership to another  ETH address. This function can only be invoked by the owner  of the contract.
